metadata.title: CVE-2018-11783 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: sslheaders plugin extracts information from the client certificate and sets headers in the request based on the configuration of the plugin. The plugin doesn't strip the headers from the request in some scenarios. This problem was discovered in versions 6.0.0 to 6.0.3, 7.0.0 to 7.1.5, and 8.0.0 to 8.0.1.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.0.2+ds-1ubuntu1').
